issue.message: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE no longer provides write access when targeting Android 11+, even when using `requestLegacyExternalStorage`
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
issue.errorLine1: val megaPixels: String = String.format("%.1f", (width * height.toFloat()) / ONE_MEGA_PIXEL)

issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Call requires API level 33 (current min is 29): `launchChangeAppLanguageIntent`
When targeting Android 13 or higher, posting a permission requires holding the `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` permission (usage from org.fossify.commons.asynctasks.CopyMoveTask)
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.
The application should not provide its own launch screen
Avoid passing `null` as the view root (needed to resolve layout parameters on the inflated layout's root element)
Avoid passing `null` as the view root (needed to resolve layout parameters on the inflated layout's root element)
Limit vector icons sizes to 200×200 to keep icon drawing fast; see https://developer.android.com/studio/write/vector-asset-studio#when for more
A newer version of Gradle than 8.13 is available: 8.14.3
A newer version of com.android.application than 8.11.1 is available: 8.13.0. (There is also a newer version of 8.11.𝑥 available, if upgrading to 8.13.0 is difficult: 8.11.2)
A newer version of androidx.camera:camera-camera2 than 1.4.2 is available: 1.5.0
A newer version of androidx.camera:camera-core than 1.4.2 is available: 1.5.0
A newer version of androidx.camera:camera-extensions than 1.4.2 is available: 1.5.0
A newer version of androidx.camera:camera-lifecycle than 1.4.2 is available: 1.5.0
A newer version of androidx.camera:camera-video than 1.4.2 is available: 1.5.0
A newer version of androidx.camera:camera-view than 1.4.2 is available: 1.5.0
A newer version of androidx.lifecycle:lifecycle-runtime-ktx than 2.8.6 is available: 2.9.4
A newer version of `compileSdkVersion` than 34 is available: 36
Expecting `android:screenOrientation="unspecified"` or `"fullSensor"` for this activity so the user can use the application in any orientation and provide a great experience on Chrome OS devices

Fixed screen orientations will be ignored in most cases, starting from Android 16. Android is moving toward a model where apps are expected to adapt to various orientations, display sizes, and aspect ratios.

issue.message: Replace "-" with an "en dash" character (–, –) ?
issue.errorLine1: <string name="faq_1_text">Se riippuu tarkoituksestasi. Yleisissä tarkoituksissa useimmat ihmiset suosittelevat käyttämään 75-80%, kun kuva on edelleen todella hyvälaatuinen, mutta tiedoston koko pienenee huomattavasti verrattuna 100%:iin.</string>

issue.message: Replace "-" with an "en dash" character (–, –) ?
issue.errorLine1: <string name="faq_1_text">Me råder til å nytte 75 - 80 %. Bilete vil framleis sjå bra ut, men dei vil nytte mindre rom enn ved 100 %.</string>

issue.message: Replace "-" with an "en dash" character (–, –) ?
issue.errorLine1: <string name="faq_1_text">Zależy to od Twojego celu. Do celów ogólnych większość ludzi zaleca poziom 75-80% — wtedy obraz jest nadal w dobrej jakości, ale rozmiar pliku znacznie zmniejsza się w porównaniu do 100%.</string>

issue.message: Replace "-" with an "en dash" character (–, –) ?
issue.errorLine1: <string name="faq_1_text">Det beror på ditt mål. För generiska ändamål rekommenderar de flesta att man använder 75-80 %, då bilden fortfarande har riktigt bra kvalitet, men filstorleken minskar drastiskt jämfört med 100 %.</string>

The project references RTL attributes, but does not explicitly enable or disable RTL support with `android:supportsRtl` in the manifest
